title: 3rd age plateskirt

properties.name: description
properties.value: The 3rd age plateskirt is a part of the 3rd age melee set. Requiring level 65 Defence to wear, it has the second highest defence bonuses of all non-degradable melee leg slot items, only surpassed by the justiciar legguards. The 3rd age plateskirt is a possible reward from hard, elite and master tier Treasure Trails and cannot be made through the Smithing skill.

Advanced data
Item ID23242

The 3rd age plateskirt is a part of the 3rd age melee set. Requiring level 65 Defence to wear, it has the second highest defence bonuses of all non-degradable melee leg slot items, only surpassed by the justiciar legguards. The 3rd age plateskirt is a possible reward from hard, elite and master tier Treasure Trails and cannot be made through the Smithing skill.

It is roughly on-par with bandos tassets for melee defence, however 3rd age armour emphasises slash and crush defensive bonuses and lacks a strength bonus. Due to its price and lack of offensive bonuses, it is very rarely used for combat.

 Attack bonuses
+0+0+0-25-2
 Defence bonuses
+78+76+83-5+75
 Other bonusesSlot

18 April 2019

Requiring level 65 [[Defence]] to wear, it has the second highest defence bonuses of all non-degradable melee leg slot items, only surpassed by the [[justiciar legguards]]. The 3rd age plateskirt is a possible reward from [[Clue scroll (hard)|hard]], [[Clue scroll (elite)|elite]] and [[Clue scroll (master)|master]] tier [[Treasure Trails]] and cannot be made through the [[Smithing]] skill. It is roughly on-par with [[bandos tassets]] for melee defence, however 3rd age armour emphasises slash and crush defensive bonuses and lacks a [[strength bonus]]. Due to its price and lack of offensive bonuses, it is very rarely used for combat. {{Infobox Bonuses |astab = 0 |aslash = 0 |acrush = 0 |amagic = -25 |arange = -2 |dstab = 78 |dslash = 76 |dcrush = 83 |dmagic = -5 |drange = 75 |str = 0 |rstr = 0 |mdmg = 0 |prayer = 0 |slot = legs |image = [[File:3rd age plateskirt equipped male.png|170px]] |altimage = [[File:3rd age plateskirt equipped female.png|170px]] }} ==Item sources== {{Drop sources|3rd age plateskirt}} ==Changes== {{Subject changes header}} {{Subject changes |date = 18 April 2019 |update = QoL and Treasure Trails Feedback Changes |change = The item's inventory appearance was slightly adjusted, so it no longer disappears on the floor from certain angles. }} {{Subject changes footer}} ===Gallery (historical)=== {|style="text-align: center" cellpadding="15" |[[File:3rd age plateskirt (v1) detail.png|center|300x150px]] |[[File:3rd age plateskirt detail.png|center|300x150px]] |- |[[File:3rd age plateskirt v1.png|center]] |[[File:3rd age plateskirt.png|center]] |- |11 April 2019 –
